Title: Refraining from intrusive thoughts is strategy dependent: a comment on sugiura, et al. and a preliminary informal test of detached mindfulness, acceptance, and other strategies
Author: Wells, Adrian; Roussis, Panagiotis
ResultSummary: No group difference on intrusion between Acceptance and control group

Title: A prospective examination of risk factors in the development of intrusions following a trauma analog
Author: Ripley, Adam J.; Clapp, Joshua D.; Beck, J. Gayle
ResultSummary: Sad induction had higher intrusions than humor induction
Notes_fromMo: Used a one-item questionnaire asking to indicate how frequently intrusions happened. Used regression instead of t test. Had priming manipulation did not report data~ consult dr. hu
